prompt: In one sentence, give me an overview of {topic_primary}.
Briefly explain what '{related_a}' refers to in the context of {topic_primary}.
State one common assumption people make about '{related_a}' in terms of {topic_primary}.
Give me one key difference between '{related_a}' and {topic_primary}.
List some key words that are related to {related_a} so I can look them up later.
Give one everyday context where '{related_a}' shows up.
Name one thing {related_a} is often confused with.
Suggest one short question you would ask an expert to better understand {related_a}.
Offer one short analogy that captures the relationship between {related_a} and {topic_primary}.
